channel.title: Back for the first time in many months need a heads up on cheating
channel.description:
I quit cheating after the mass ban althought my main didnt get axed. I didnt wanna risk em and the cheat community busted into a million pieces anyways. Decided to look and see how a few were doing and saw that mopar had made one. Knowing how good his stuff is and that his proxy .bat file saved my main from the mass ban I decided to take a look.
Amazingly this cheat community is alive! Can someone update me on the cheating and how safe aryan is etc. whether or not you get flagged right away and wherther there are anymore cheats available. I know about srl and thas about it.

item.title: Back for the first time in many months need a heads up on cheating
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

theghost14:

Ok heres a good summary

Impsoft bot was made
Fagex and impsoft went to war
Slave bot was made
Ghost Bot was made
Fagex went down
Fagex back up
Fagex back down
Sythe makes scarscape2

impsoft bot, slave bot, and ghost bot are all just aryan :rolleyes:

Read full topic
